    • Constructor Detail

      • YRCRelatedTaskExtensionHandler

        public YRCRelatedTaskExtensionHandler()

    • Method Detail

      • createRelatedTask

        public static void createRelatedTask(org.w3c.dom.Element relatedTask,
                                     boolean addTaskToManager)
        This method is used to create related task category and related task group element. Corresponding objects will be constructed from this element and entries will be made to corresponding lists maintained in YRCRelatedTaskExtensionHandler. When we add related task we create an element which stores all the information required to add the related task. During perform finish we construct two objects. YRCRelatedTask and YRCRelatedTaskCategory, if required YRCRelatedTaskGroup is also constructed from the same element. This element is used to save the related task info in yuix in the same state as it was created.See saveRelatedTask in ExtensionFileHelper. This element remains in yuix till the changes are not synchronized. If an application is closed without synchronizing the changes on relogin we construct the objects again from this element. Everything is same except that we do not add the related task to YRCRelatedTasksManager so the tasks do not show up. But they can be seen in the related task tab in synchronized panel.
        Parameters:
        relatedTask -
        addTaskToManager -

      • clearRelatedTask

        public static void clearRelatedTask()
        This method is used to clear the meta deta information and the lists which maintain the objects required for contructing and saving related task. This method is called when we synchronize the data to plugin.xml

      • removeRelatedTask

        public static void removeRelatedTask(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TableItem tableItem)
        This method is used to remove a related task.When removing a related task remove the related task element which is used to store the meta deta information of a related task, and is used to save the related task related info in the yuix file if data is saved but is not synchronized. Once synchronized this meta deta is removed by using the clearRelatedTask() method.
        Parameters:
        tableItem -

      • removeRelatedTaskFromManager

        public static void removeRelatedTaskFromManager(YRCRelatedTask relatedTask,
                                                YRCRelatedTasksCategory relatedTaskCategory)

      • updateRelatedTaskGroup

        public static void updateRelatedTaskGroup()
        This method will look for all the related task group in the relatedTaskGroupExtensionsList and remove it if no task are found in the relatedTaskExtensionList defined in the group. This method is used to clean group list when deleting and editing related task, in order to remove duplicate entries.

      • updateRelatedTaskCategory

        public static void updateRelatedTaskCategory()
        This method is used to add a category to YRCRelatedTasksManager when any category is edited. This takes care of the case when we add multiple tasks in the same category and then edit the category id when editing related task. This method will add the category if it exists in the relatedTaskCategoriesExtensionList and is not defined in the YRCRelatedTasksManager categories list.
